snippet.title: Giftpia Playthrough Part 01 (Opening)
snippet.description:
This is to educate people about the greatest developer ever.  I will post Moon: Remix RPG Adventure, U.F.O.: A Day In The Life, L.O.L.: Lack Of Love, Endonesia, Chulip, and Giftpia.  They share common ideas.  I will not post Coloball 2002, Freshly-Picked Tingle's Rosy Rupeeland, Ripening Tingle's Balloon Trip Of Love, Rule Of Rose, Little King's Story, Chibi-Robo: Plug Into Adventure, Chibi-Robo: Park Patrol, Captain Rainbow, or Chibi-Robo: Welcome Home, though I recommend that you play all of those stellar titles.  Register for Nico Nico Douga to see playthroughs of those.
If you want EVERY song from EVERY game of theirs, go here: http://www.gamingforce.org/forums/my-stuff/36720-assortment-love-de-lic-companys-music.html
If you want to read about the greatest game ever made (which also happens to be the zenith of games-as-art), go here: http://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=376513

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Love-de-Lic
http://www.hardcoregaming101.net/lovedelic/lovedelic.htm
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vanpool
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skip
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Punchline
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Little_King_Story
http://lovedelicgames.wordpress.com
http://love-de-licious.livejournal.com

Enjoy!
